Name: Krebs Cycle
Description: The citric acid cycle comprises 8 enzymatic reactions converting acetyl-CoA to CO2.

Name: NAD+ Salvage Pathway
Description: Recycles Nicotinamide into NAD+, crucial for longevity and Sirtuin activity.

Name: Glycolysis
Description: Converts Glucose to Pyruvate, generating ATP and NADH.

Name: Oxidative Stress & Inflammation
Description: ROS generation, Antioxidant Defense, and Inflammation signaling.

Name: Fat Metabolism (Beta-Oxidation)
Description: Breakdown of Fatty Acids into Acetyl-CoA for energy.

Name: Longevity Control (mTOR/AMPK)
Description: The central sensing network regulating growth vs. repair.

Name: Urea Cycle
Description: Detoxification of Ammonia from protein breakdown.
